Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2008 08:59AM KarrieL98 wrote: I was was told that I have breast cancer last Wednesday the 27th of Feb and that I will be getting Mastsectomy on both sides along with a historectemy.  I am 30 with two small kids and also scared to death.  They do chemo and radiation to stop the spread and incase they missed anything on the margins to get rid of it.
Posts.Title: So confused. 3 lumpectomies Please help Bibbie angie27
